messages.content: Could be depression with psychotic features. Talk to your doctor asap!
I was more concerned that your comment held a frame of reference assuming it was real.
I feel like you need to get out of your current situation for the sake of your own happiness.
You should take the time and go to the doctor.
May [NAME] bless and keep the President... far away from us!
Um... I’m extremely concerned as to which one’s business and which one’s casual.
Praying for the one who wrote that, that he isn't gonna caught...
Don't worry, no one ever will
[NAME] bless them and their racist logo
You shouldn't be so hard on yourself. Just relax, take a deep breath, let the blood flow. Everything's going to be fine.
It's a repost but this space is too kindness for a downvote, take care
He is sacrificing himself for our sins. [NAME] bless.
Meditate. You may need to seek medical help. Good luck, friend.
Best of luck mate. I’ve yet to reach my limit but this brought me closer
You gotta work on you dude!! If you're not confident you're not ready, get yourself straight And all will fall into place.
This is something that has to be learned from experience. Don't be hard on yourself!
please report the physical and emotional abuse to the police so there is record of it. And get a lawyer ASAP.
Shhhhhhh ... It will be ok, honey.
She sounds like she could be depressed. People who have depression need care, love and help to get better, not internet shaming.
Best of luck in Cleveland, Plaw Dog!
2-4 minutes is not enough time to wash long hair. 10-15 minutes minimum. Stay strong!
I'd be careful with that, could be construed as cybersquatting which is illegal.
Get a second opinion from a different doctor. Eczema can get exacerbated by home remedies sometimes, so be sure to check with another doc first.
It's over! Move on and find a better partner.
Dude, its **life** it's not **trauma**. Grow up
I carry on an empty. But I also carry a single action. So don't make my mistakes.
End this relationship NOW. And please learn from it!!
I’m having a counseling this weekend ... nothing to be scared.... just tell them about your feelings and what are you worrying about..
Rose coloured glasses get rosier as time goes by :) You'll move on eventually. Treasure the memory but be present in your current and future relationships.
good luck! I wish you the best <33
Go with her, eat healthy food with her too. It may help
You got the true ending don't worry, you would only get the bad ending if you rat out your friends or accepted the deal
You will find the words that work for your dynamic. The fact you are worried and thinking about it is 75% of the battle
I’m glad you had a great time here! Wishing you safe travels!
That’s always my worst fear when the idea of leaving during January comes up. I wish you the best of luck in unthawing them!
Tell her boyfriend and send him the screenshots of her saying she’s having affairs for proof. Then cut this toxic person out of your life!
Good luck with your procedure! Be strong and don't try to let anyone even think they can try to change your mind. This is your decision.
I’m with you, like shouldn’t we call someone or make sure this was followed up on? This poor guy.
Don’t wait. Take control of your life back and leave. You know that’s what’s going to happen.
It hasn’t happened yet. Just talk to the supervisor or HR. In the meantime don’t borrow trouble.
I think it's time to let him go, for your life's sake!
If it's true i'm sad he's leaving but I wish him nothing but the best.
No doubt would start at wing. We need help there and it would help ease him in
yikes I am not reading that, the napkins are over there sir, have a nice day
This is a toxic behaviour.. get rid of him as soon as possible.
What happened? Did something set you off? THough sometimes we can have good days and bad days, don't let it offset the progress you've made
